===Origins===
The '''Octessence''' was an assembly of eight rival entities among the [[Glossary:Principalities|principalities]]: [[Balthakk (Earth-616)|Balthakk]], [[Cyttorak (Earth-616)|Cyttorak]], [[Farallah (Earth-616)|Farallah]], [[Ikonn (Earth-616)|Ikonn]], [[Krakkan (Earth-616)|Krakkan]], [[Raggadorr (Earth-616)|Raggadorr]], [[Valtorr (Earth-616)|Valtorr]], and [[Watoomb (Earth-616)|Watoomb]], who sought to prove themselves the most powerful. Instead of entering in open conflict, they set the [[Wager of the Octessence]]: each member would empower a mortal using a talisman to fight for said principality as its [[Exemplars (Earth-616)|Exemplar (avatar)]].{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 8|; Octessence's profile}}

===Early years===
[[Dyzakk (Earth-616)|Dyzakk]], one of the principalities,{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 3|; [[Demons]]' entry}} (though not part of the Octessence)<!-- no explicit ref --> created the dimension known as [[Dyzakk (Dimension)|Dyzakk]] in the 24th hour of the eight day, to make it very difficult to reach. The "Dungeon Dimension" (as it came to be known) was an enormous prison for sorcerers, witches, [[Demons|demons]], [[Devils|devils]] and [[Angels (Monotheism)|angels]] found guilty for crimes against the mystic principalities of the Octessence.{{r|[http://www.marvunapp.com/ohotmu/appendixes/mdapp.htm Mystic Dimensions - From the Journals of Ian McNee at the Appendix]: The [[Archipelago of Anguish and Redemption|Splinter Realms (The Dark Dimension, the Archipelago of Anguish and Redemption)]], [[Dyzakk (Dimension)|Dyzakk]]'s entry}} That reality frequently worked with the [[Krakkan (Dimension)|Krakkan dimension]], the realm of Octessence member [[Krakkan (Earth-616)|Krakkan]], in order to punish and restraint those who offended the Octessence.{{r|[http://www.marvunapp.com/ohotmu/appendixes/mdapp.htm Mystic Dimensions - From the Journals of Ian McNee at the Appendix]: The [[Archipelago of Anguish and Redemption|Splinter Realms (The Dark Dimension, the Archipelago of Anguish and Redemption)]], [[Krakkan (Dimension)|Krakkan]]'s entry}}

===[[Modern Age]]===
====War of the Seven Spheres====
Before the [[War of the Seven Spheres]] began, many of the principalities and mystic entities usually invoked for power sought to recruit [[Stephen Strange (Earth-616)|Doctor Strange]] to fight for them, including Octessence's members [[Cyttorak (Earth-616)|Cyttorak]], [[Ikonn (Earth-616)|Ikonn]], [[Raggadorr (Earth-616)|Raggadorr]], [[Valtorr (Earth-616)|Valtorr]], and [[Watoomb (Earth-616)|Watoomb]], arrived to claim Strange for their side. To escape them all, Strange invoked the [[Law of Emancipation]], relinquish the ability to call upon any of the powers and principalities.{{r|Doctor Strange, Sorcerer Supreme #49}}

All of the members of the Octessence were involved in the [[War of the Seven Spheres]].{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 8|; Octessence's profile}} The conflict would last five thousand years, though waged within months by human reckoning.{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 8|; Octessence's profile}}<!--
